channel.title: [Delta] - Magic Magic - [Delta]
channel.description: On a delta base, how do I change the animation and gfx of a spell for the user of the spell and the person that is getting hit by it. for example water blast, how would I change the blue projectile that flies through the air and then the blue explosion that happens around the person getting hit?

item.title: [Delta] - Magic Magic - [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

i think the height is by pixels

the

//------ID------emote--gfx----usesFirst-lvl----rune1--rune1am--rune2---rune2am--rune3--rune3am--rune4--rune4am-item---hitdiff--XP-----projH.--EndH.----SpellName

part hes right about but thats not the thing, he said when you change the EndH part of the setup or in for example a wind stikeâ€™s EndH

spell = 1152	711	90	1	1	558	1	556	1	-1	0	-1	0	-1	2	40	43	100	Wind_Strike

would be the 43 in that, If I change the 43 nothing changes, everything is still exactly the same so it doesnt help.

item.title: [Delta] - Magic Magic - [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

MagicSpells.cfg
Second number is the animation, third is the gfx, 17th is the projectile.

Ex

spell = 1152 Animation GFX 1 1 558 1 556 1 -1 0 -1 0 -1 2 90 Projectile 100 Wind_Strike

Read full topic
